alert.note: Alert for Champaign; Clark; Darke; Greene; Miami; Montgomery; Preble (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 5:42PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF EASTERN PREBLE, SOUTHWESTERN CHAMPAIGN, NORTHEASTERN BUTLER, NORTHERN WARREN, SOUTHEASTERN DARKE, NORTHWESTERN CLARK, WESTERN GREENE, MONTGOMERY AND MIAMI COUNTIES THROUGH 630 PM EDT... At 542 PM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Arcanum to near Hamilton, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dayton, Hamilton, Kettering, Middletown, Beavercreek, Huber Heights, Fairborn, Xenia, Troy, Trotwood, Miamisburg, Lebanon, Springboro, Vandalia, Englewood, Greenville, Monroe, Trenton, Franklin and Tipp City. This includes the following Interstates... I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 11 and 46. I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 36 and 41. I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 29 and 77. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for southwestern and west central Ohio. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Champaign; Clark; Darke; Greene; Miami; Montgomery; Preble
